title: Luminary Tour: Ray Johnson c/o
hero_caption: Ray Johnson, Oedipus (Elvis Presley #1), 1956–58. Promised gift of The William S. Wilson Collection of Ray Johnson.
short_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of the exhibition Ray Johnson c/o and explore the collages and collaborations that made Johnson a defining figure in mail art and “New York’s most famous unknown artist."
list_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of the exhibition Ray Johnson c/o.
description:
Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of the exhibition Ray Johnson c/o and explore the collages and collaborations that made Johnson a defining figure in mail art and “New York’s most famous unknown artist."

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to twelve participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed.

Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable. Find further information on what to expect on our website.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to twelve participants.
